text: Agar sumoro ʙimi on ast, ki dar kori jatimon adolat nakuned, az zanon har ci sumoro pisand aftad, du-du va se-se va cahor-cahor ʙa nikoh, darovared. Va agar ʙimi on dored, ki ʙa adolat raftor nakuned, tanho jak zan ʙigired jo har ci moliki on saved. In rohe ʙehtar ast to ki zulmu sitam nakuned
